ORIGAM Documentation : Inheritance

Created by Tomáš Vavrda on Sep 04, 2014

Comments:

When an ancestor (e.g. entity B) is removed from entity A, than there is no check whether fields from B are used somewhere within context of A. So that it can lead to inconsistent model.
